reviews.review: There are occasional bugs but I cannot stop playing this game. They always have great events and it never gets old.

Malheureusement DBD √©tait un tr√®s bon jeux avant leur derni√®re mise √† jours et tout les bug quelle √† pu ajout√©e : 
- Perte de pipe alors qu'on devrais sois stagn√© sois mont√©e / ainsi que perte si un joueur dc pendantle chargement.
- Tueur avec une hitbox de l'infinie entre le fait qu'il te hit alors que tes √† 10 m ou qu'il t'attrape sans ouvrir le casier ou tu es.
- Le rayon de terreur qui des fois ne s'active tout simplement pas ( alors qu'il n'y avait aucune perk pour )
- Le tueur qui passe du mauvais cot√© de la palette.
- Les flashlight qui aveugle mais ne font pas tomber le survivant qui est port√©e.
- Les soins qui font bloqu√©e ton perso dans les escalier.
- Les tp des tueur qui devrait pas en avoir
Et je dois surement en passer plein ! 
Tu rajoute √† √ßa le cot√© de la communaut√© cancer niveau tueur et survivant √ßa marche dans les deux sens : 
En tueur :
- Les face camp / tunnel / slugg 
- AFk
- Les russe qui insidieux buuba cave 
- Les hachettes de chasseuse qui one shoot mais qu'elle te snipe √† travers des mur
Et plein d'autre petit truc qui rende la survit bien desagr√©able
En survivant : 
- Les mec qui rush les gen que tu vois pas de la partie 
- Les ti bag
- Les clic clic avec la lamp
- Les mec qui t'abbandonne alors que tes que p1
- Les afk / ou les mec qui font rien de la game 
Et plein d'autre truc 
Bref tout √ßa vous donnera une bonne envie de gerber ou un bon cancer selon le temps pass√©e sur le jeux.
En √©sperant qu'il patch au moins les bug pour que le jeux redevienne un minimum jouable.
Cool ig only with a squad ques are ass

i played this game for maybe an hour, my gf said "hey that looks fun, can i have a turn".

ive still only played it for an hour

A great game not gonna lie, but don't buy it if you hate bugs. I will get used to them but they are annoying. Played this game a while and can say that this game is fun, but broken. They can for sure fix it, but it will take them some good time because they seem not to care that much about their players feedback. They do care, of course, but not that much.
So in conclusion, buy this game only if you want to play for fun, maybe with your friends so you can ignore the bugs easier.

The new MMR system sucks, and I don't even want to play because of it. They never made survivor movement smooth again, the old movement was so much better. The game hasn't changed in over a year and a half of playing it. Can't wait for VHS.

great and fun to play together with friends.
playing killer is fun too.

Hit box inexistentes, los killers te pegan a 2 metros de distancia atravezando palllets, paredes o cualquier otro objeto, sin mencionar las animaciones nuevas que meterieron (est√°n de la mierda). Las nuevas animaciones solo entorpecen a los sobrevivientes, las casas cubicas estan tapadas y los pallets no sirven un carajo, sus actualizaciones son una cagada para los sobrevivientes

sometime the update make even worst to play like some map got too many pallet like 20 pallet the new update... that make even worst to killer if got that type map... that is unfair for killer because that not balance and the DEV say they fix something but their not even fix... DEV only update for Survivor even make Survivor be strong with more pallet to bully killer... And Rank system this game are trash because if you are killer rank 16 , and you got play with Survival rank 2-7 with this new update... AND WTF 1 MAP GOT LIKE 20 PALLET? BIRD BRAIN DEV??

This Game is a total waste of money. 
Its a cash grab that puts 80% of the game behind a pay wall.

I would say the Devs of the game are stupid, because

1. The game isnt balanced at all 
(Items are almost useless, some Killers are OP and some weak af, 
there are maps where the Survivors have almost 0% chance of winning).

2. There are bugs that get abused by a lot of people.

3. Your rank gos up by points which you have little control over and isnt realy skill based.
(There are 4 types of medalls you need to get a rank up and one of theme is litrally playing bad and get cough wich you wont get 90% of the time and the others are based of how much you did (If you help to much you wont get a rank up, if you make to much gens you wont get a rank up, if you die you wont get a rank up) and you need to do a little bit of all to get a rank up wich is dumb because sometimes there isnt even the opertunity to get them (If the Killer is realy bad and no one gets hit you cant get the "Helped other" medal)).

but they probably arent stupid. They just dont care (thats even worse in my opinion).

The only good thing i can think of is that the game has a nice Com.
There are some Toxic people, but over all they are very rare and its always funny to see how they are raging.
very good I juice killer, and brad is moth and eats pallets for din din
I will never recover from all this stuffs i bought lol

This game is somewhat addictive, but if there was another game similar to this on the market, I would play that one instead as BHVR is a company I no longer wish to support. 

The BHVR team works whenever they feel like it, and there is a reason most companies don't have such a policy. When your employees get to decide when they work, the ones that do decide to work complete simple tasks that matter to them as creators but not necessarily to the community, the most famous example of this being the team not implementing a colorblind mode because they've "heard [the request] a million times" and "if it gets done, it'll get done." Keep in mind, it's been four and a half years. The only reason this game is still alive is because there is no competition and it sucks consumers in with its cosmetics. This is coming from a player who mostly plays SWF (survive with friends).
If you are going to play this with friends it is very good!

As much as I love this game i cannot in good faith tell people to buy it or play it. Between ps4 and Pc I have put around 3300 hours into this game. The last update (which a majority of the player base said was not needed or wanted and was released anyways) has game breaking problems this game is almost 5 years old and it still feels like youre playing a beta version of the game. The newest updates have made on side totally unplayable and the devs just don'tlisten to their community and only care about pumping out expensive cosmetics....They really went for looks over actual game play and control of your character it doesnt matter how nice a game looks if it plays like crap.
Edit: The game is still very buggy but it's not AS bad as it was and the devs are talking about taking a break and actually fixing the game!!! If they fix ill change my review
I love this game so much. It only makes me want to slam my head through the monitor HALF the time.

I play this game because it makes my depression even harder to ignore :) Little tip, if its a bobba, he will camp u so don't get killed. 

Great game if you wanna stress out and shake out of terror when you are the last survivor trying to open a gate knowing the killer is close.

Imagine having a great concept and design for a game, but having developers like BHVR that can't pull their heads out of their *** long enough to pay attention to their community.  They are consistent at two things.  1.  Breaking their game with every update.  2.  Releasing cosmetics no matter the disarray of their product or community to cash in.

The game used to be playable, but since the last update came out, there has been quit a lot of issues BHVR have to fix. Hitboxes, desync, new UI, animations and bugs, The biggest problem personally was the unstable server, I always got kicked out of a trail for no reason, or one particular player left at the start of the game and the remaining players got kicked out of the trail and lost their rank. I really hope the next update will bring our DBD back to normal.

The update that they put out in accordance with the lunar new year has actually broken the game for survivors, the amount of lag on their servers is absolutely infuriating, and there is no excusing it. also the unbroken de-pip bug for higher ranked players is obnoxious as well, it completely breaks the matchmaking system. I wouldn't recommend playing purchasing or supporting BHVR until they fix their game.
Once you start playing it you wont stop conplaining about how broken it is, on a side note good game tho.
this game is alot of fun just make sure if you dont have the best graphics card you change it to low resoluition

Excelente juego asim√©trico, con una gran variedad de supervivientes y asesinos, cada uno con sus habilidades y ventajas √∫nicas, pero siempre teniendo un forma de compartirlas con los dem√°s personajes. Como todo juego posee algunos bugs comprensibles, pero que poco a poco los desarrolladores han atendido.
Actualizaciones y eventos constantes y casi todo lo puedes comprar con la moneda del juego que ganas una partida tras otra. Lo recomiendo encarecidamente para compartir con tus amigos (supervivientes) o simplemente para divertirte en solitario (asesino) atormentando al equipo rival.
